data.title: Kastamonu University
data.meta_description: Programs and admission procedure of Kastamonu University Kastamonu Turkey for 2024 - 2025.
data.text:
Kastamonu - Turkey

Admission 2024 - 2025

Back

The Kastamonu University is a public university and is located in kastamonu, Turkey. The university was established in 2006 and has more than 21000 students in it.

Faculties

University provides its expertise in numerous walks of life. One can imagine this fact by reading their following faculty: College of education, Faculty of Forestry, Faculty of Arts and Sciences, Faculty of Economics and Administrative Sciences, Faculty of Fisheries, Faculty of Communication, Faculty of Engineering and Architecture and Seminary.

Programs and Courses

Institutes

There are two institutes in university and these are Institute of Science and Institute of Social Sciences.

Schools

There are also some schools in university with name of Fazil Boyner School of Health Sciences, School of Physical Education and Sport, School of Civil Aviation and School of Tourism and Hotel Management.

Vocational Schools

Vocational schools present in university are: Kastamonu Vocational School, Rifat Ilgaz Cide Vocational School, Inebolu Vocational School, Tosya Vocational School, Vocational School Stone Bridge, Vehicle Vocational School, Devrekani Vocational School, Ihsangazi Vocational School, Globe College, Abana Sabahat-Mesut Yilmaz Vocational School and Booth College.

Research and Application Centers

Research centers present in this university are: Scientific Research Projects Management Unit, Project Research, Development and Implementation Coordinator, Distance Education and Research Center, Coordinator of Research and Practice Centers, Parks and Gardens Coordinator, Coordinator of International Students and Coordinator of International Bilateral Agreements.
